page.description: The Module object provides information about an code module.

method.name: Executable()
method.description: Get the executables that contains the module.

method.name: HasMethod()
method.description: Return true if the method exists.

method.name: InvokeInstanceMethod()
method.description: Invoke an instance method of an executable.

method.name: InvokeMethod()
method.description: Invoke a method of an executable.

method.name: LinesGet()
method.description: Get lines from a module if it has debug symbol information.

page.example: dim module as P dim exe as P dim name as C module = type::xbasicmodule.get_current() exe = module.executable() name = exe.name() ui_msg_box("Name of Current Script or Function",name)
